item.title: Scala for the Intrigued
item.description: This is a very nice series of posts about Scala by Venkat Subramaniam The Elegance of Scala Sensible Typing and Optional Items Cute Classes and Pure OO Functional Style of Programming Working with Collections Creating Higher Order Functions Pattern Matching XML as First Class Citizen Recursions and Tail Call Optimization Using Traits Chaining Traits Concurrency in Scala
